Arguments.Text: a charcoal - burner and his wife
they grew poorer and poorer . the nights in which they went hungry to bed became more and more frequent
here we are , ready to work like slaves the whole day long , and no work can we get .
the nights in which they went hungry to bed became more and more frequent .
he heard a sound of sobbing
he stopped to listen , thinking that perhaps he might be able to give some help
here we are , ready to work like slaves the whole day long , and no work can we get .
were there ever two people so unhappy
